00025 
00026 btGImpactMeshShapePart::btGImpactMeshShapePart( btStridingMeshInterface * meshInterface, int part )
00027 {
00028     // moved from .h to .cpp because of conditional compilation
00029     // (The setting of BT_THREADSAFE may differ between various cpp files, so it is best to
00030     // avoid using it in h files)
00031     m_primitive_manager.m_meshInterface = meshInterface;
00032     m_primitive_manager.m_part = part;
00033     m_box_set.setPrimitiveManager( &m_primitive_manager );
00034 #if BT_THREADSAFE
00035     // If threadsafe is requested, this object uses a different lock/unlock
00036     //  model with the btStridingMeshInterface -- lock once when the object is constructed
00037     //  and unlock once in the destructor.
00038     // The other way of locking and unlocking for each collision check in the narrowphase
00039     // is not threadsafe.  Note these are not thread-locks, they are calls to the meshInterface's
00040     // getLockedReadOnlyVertexIndexBase virtual function, which by default just returns a couple of
00041     // pointers.  In theory a client could override the lock function to do all sorts of
00042     // things like reading data from GPU memory, or decompressing data on the fly, but such things
00043     // do not seem all that likely or useful, given the performance cost.
00044     m_primitive_manager.lock();
00045 #endif
00046 }
00047 
00048 btGImpactMeshShapePart::~btGImpactMeshShapePart()
00049 {
00050     // moved from .h to .cpp because of conditional compilation
00051 #if BT_THREADSAFE
00052     m_primitive_manager.unlock();
00053 #endif
00054 }
00055 
00056 void btGImpactMeshShapePart::lockChildShapes() const
00057 {
00058     // moved from .h to .cpp because of conditional compilation
00059 #if ! BT_THREADSAFE
00060     // called in the narrowphase -- not threadsafe!
00061     void * dummy = (void*) ( m_box_set.getPrimitiveManager() );
00062     TrimeshPrimitiveManager * dummymanager = static_cast<TrimeshPrimitiveManager *>( dummy );
00063     dummymanager->lock();
00064 #endif
00065 }
00066 
00067 void btGImpactMeshShapePart::unlockChildShapes()  const
00068 {
00069     // moved from .h to .cpp because of conditional compilation
00070 #if ! BT_THREADSAFE
00071     // called in the narrowphase -- not threadsafe!
00072     void * dummy = (void*) ( m_box_set.getPrimitiveManager() );
00073     TrimeshPrimitiveManager * dummymanager = static_cast<TrimeshPrimitiveManager *>( dummy );
00074     dummymanager->unlock();
00075 #endif
00076 }

00079 #define CALC_EXACT_INERTIA 1
00080 
00081 
00082 void btGImpactCompoundShape::calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const
00083 {
00084         lockChildShapes();
00085 #ifdef CALC_EXACT_INERTIA
00086         inertia.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00087 
00088         int i = this->getNumChildShapes();
00089         btScalar shapemass = mass/btScalar(i);
00090 
00091         while(i--)
00092         {
00093                 btVector3 temp_inertia;
00094                 m_childShapes[i]->calculateLocalInertia(shapemass,temp_inertia);
00095                 if(childrenHasTransform())
00096                 {
00097                         inertia = gim_inertia_add_transformed( inertia,temp_inertia,m_childTransforms[i]);
00098                 }
00099                 else
00100                 {
00101                         inertia = gim_inertia_add_transformed( inertia,temp_inertia,btTransform::getIdentity());
00102                 }
00103 
00104         }
00105 
00106 #else
00107 
00108         // Calc box inertia
00109 
00110         btScalar lx= m_localAABB.m_max[0] - m_localAABB.m_min[0];
00111         btScalar ly= m_localAABB.m_max[1] - m_localAABB.m_min[1];
00112         btScalar lz= m_localAABB.m_max[2] - m_localAABB.m_min[2];
00113         const btScalar x2 = lx*lx;
00114         const btScalar y2 = ly*ly;
00115         const btScalar z2 = lz*lz;
00116         const btScalar scaledmass = mass * btScalar(0.08333333);
00117 
00118         inertia = scaledmass * (btVector3(y2+z2,x2+z2,x2+y2));
00119 
00120 #endif
00121         unlockChildShapes();
00122 }

00125 
00126 void btGImpactMeshShapePart::calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const
00127 {
00128         lockChildShapes();
00129 
00130 
00131 #ifdef CALC_EXACT_INERTIA
00132         inertia.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00133 
00134         int i = this->getVertexCount();
00135         btScalar pointmass = mass/btScalar(i);
00136 
00137         while(i--)
00138         {
00139                 btVector3 pointintertia;
00140                 this->getVertex(i,pointintertia);
00141                 pointintertia = gim_get_point_inertia(pointintertia,pointmass);
00142                 inertia+=pointintertia;
00143         }
00144 
00145 #else
00146 
00147         // Calc box inertia
00148 
00149         btScalar lx= m_localAABB.m_max[0] - m_localAABB.m_min[0];
00150         btScalar ly= m_localAABB.m_max[1] - m_localAABB.m_min[1];
00151         btScalar lz= m_localAABB.m_max[2] - m_localAABB.m_min[2];
00152         const btScalar x2 = lx*lx;
00153         const btScalar y2 = ly*ly;
00154         const btScalar z2 = lz*lz;
00155         const btScalar scaledmass = mass * btScalar(0.08333333);
00156 
00157         inertia = scaledmass * (btVector3(y2+z2,x2+z2,x2+y2));
00158 
00159 #endif
00160 
00161         unlockChildShapes();
00162 }
00163 
00164 void btGImpactMeshShape::calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const
00165 {
00166 
00167 #ifdef CALC_EXACT_INERTIA
00168         inertia.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00169 
00170         int i = this->getMeshPartCount();
00171         btScalar partmass = mass/btScalar(i);
00172 
00173         while(i--)
00174         {
00175                 btVector3 partinertia;
00176                 getMeshPart(i)->calculateLocalInertia(partmass,partinertia);
00177                 inertia+=partinertia;
00178         }
00179 
00180 #else
00181 
00182         // Calc box inertia
00183 
00184         btScalar lx= m_localAABB.m_max[0] - m_localAABB.m_min[0];
00185         btScalar ly= m_localAABB.m_max[1] - m_localAABB.m_min[1];
00186         btScalar lz= m_localAABB.m_max[2] - m_localAABB.m_min[2];
00187         const btScalar x2 = lx*lx;
00188         const btScalar y2 = ly*ly;
00189         const btScalar z2 = lz*lz;
00190         const btScalar scaledmass = mass * btScalar(0.08333333);
00191 
00192         inertia = scaledmass * (btVector3(y2+z2,x2+z2,x2+y2));
00193 
00194 #endif
00195 }

00199 }
00200 
00201 void btGImpactMeshShapePart::processAllTrianglesRay(btTriangleCallback* callback,const btVector3& rayFrom, const btVector3& rayTo) const
00202 {
00203         lockChildShapes();
00204 
00205         btAlignedObjectArray<int> collided;
00206         btVector3 rayDir(rayTo - rayFrom);
00207         rayDir.normalize();
00208         m_box_set.rayQuery(rayDir, rayFrom, collided);
00209 
00210         if(collided.size()==0)
00211         {
00212                 unlockChildShapes();
00213                 return;
00214         }
00215 
00216         int part = (int)getPart();
00217         btPrimitiveTriangle triangle;
00218         int i = collided.size();
00219         while(i--)
00220         {
00221                 getPrimitiveTriangle(collided[i],triangle);
00222                 callback->processTriangle(triangle.m_vertices,part,collided[i]);
00223         }
00224         unlockChildShapes();
00225 }
00226 
00227 void btGImpactMeshShapePart::processAllTriangles(btTriangleCallback* callback,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax) const
00228 {
00229         lockChildShapes();
00230         btAABB box;
00231         box.m_min = aabbMin;
00232         box.m_max = aabbMax;
00233 
00234         btAlignedObjectArray<int> collided;
00235         m_box_set.boxQuery(box,collided);
00236 
00237         if(collided.size()==0)
00238         {
00239                 unlockChildShapes();
00240                 return;
00241         }
00242 
00243         int part = (int)getPart();
00244         btPrimitiveTriangle triangle;
00245         int i = collided.size();
00246         while(i--)
00247         {
00248                 this->getPrimitiveTriangle(collided[i],triangle);
00249                 callback->processTriangle(triangle.m_vertices,part,collided[i]);
00250         }
00251         unlockChildShapes();
00252 
00253 }
00254 
00255 void btGImpactMeshShape::processAllTriangles(btTriangleCallback* callback,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax) const
00256 {
00257         int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00258         while(i--)
00259         {
00260                 m_mesh_parts[i]->processAllTriangles(callback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00261         }
00262 }
00263 
00264 void btGImpactMeshShape::processAllTrianglesRay(btTriangleCallback* callback,const btVector3& rayFrom, const btVector3& rayTo) const
00265 {
00266         int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00267         while(i--)
00268         {
00269                 m_mesh_parts[i]->processAllTrianglesRay(callback, rayFrom, rayTo);
00270         }
00271 }

00275 const char*     btGImpactMeshShape::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00276 {
00277         btGImpactMeshShapeData* trimeshData = (btGImpactMeshShapeData*) dataBuffer;
00278 
00279         btCollisionShape::serialize(&trimeshData->m_collisionShapeData,serializer);
00280 
00281         m_meshInterface->serialize(&trimeshData->m_meshInterface, serializer);
00282 
00283         trimeshData->m_collisionMargin = float(m_collisionMargin);
00284 
00285         localScaling.serializeFloat(trimeshData->m_localScaling);
00286 
00287         trimeshData->m_gimpactSubType = int(getGImpactShapeType());
00288 
00289         return "btGImpactMeshShapeData";
00290 }
